## October 2025 - January 2026

---

**Analysis Date:** 2026-01-21
**Platform:** Google Play Store (Android)
**Region:** United States
**Data Period:** October 1, 2025 - January 21, 2026

---

## Executive Summary

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Total Reviews Analyzed | 1,911 |
| Average Rating | 2.06 / 5.0 |
| Sentiment Score | -9.5 |
| 1-Star Reviews | 1,236 (64.7%) |

**Bottom Line:** The HP App on Google Play is experiencing significant user dissatisfaction with nearly two-thirds of reviews being 1-star. Critical issues center around app reliability, connectivity, and perceived value.

## Monthly Trending Report

### Review Volume & Ratings by Month

| Month | Reviews | Avg Rating | 1-Star % | 5-Star % | Top Version |
|-------|---------|------------|----------|----------|-------------|
| Oct 2025 | 637 | 1.98 | 66.7% | 17.4% | v20.1.0.5822 |
| Nov 2025 | 527 | 1.90 | 67.6% | 15.2% | v20.1.2.5988 |
| Dec 2025 | 427 | 2.14 | 63.2% | 21.1% | v20.1.2.5988 |
| Jan 2026 | 320 | 2.35 | 57.8% | 28.1% | v20.2.0.6076 |

### Sentiment Trend

| Month | Positive % | Negative % | Trend |
|-------|------------|------------|-------|
| Oct 2025 | 21.4% | 74.1% | Baseline |
| Nov 2025 | 19.5% | 77.0% | ↑ 2.9% worse |
| Dec 2025 | 26.9% | 71.0% | ↓ 6.0% better |
| Jan 2026 | 30.0% | 65.0% | ↓ 6.0% better |

### Monthly Insights

1. **November 2025 was the worst month** - Lowest avg rating (1.90), highest 1-star rate (67.6%), highest negative sentiment (77.0%)

2. **Improving trend since December** - Ratings improving from 1.90 → 2.14 → 2.35

3. **v20.2.0.6076 (Jan 2026) shows improvement** - 1-star rate dropped to 57.8% (vs 67.6% in Nov)

4. **Review volume declining** - Oct: 637 → Jan: 320 (50% drop). Could indicate:
   - Fewer new users
   - Less engagement
   - Or users giving up on feedback

## App Version Analysis

**Coverage:** 1,612 of 1,911 reviews (84.4%) include version information

### Top Versions by Review Count

| Version | Reviews | Avg Rating | 1-Star % | Trend |
|---------|---------|------------|----------|-------|
| 20.1.0.5822 | 693 | 2.02 | 64.4% | Problematic |
| 20.1.2.5988 | 401 | 2.01 | 65.8% | Problematic |
| 20.2.0.6076 | 385 | 2.32 | 59.7% | Slight improvement |
| 18.10.0.5530 | 39 | 2.26 | 51.3% | Legacy |
| 20.0.1.5732 | 14 | 2.50 | 42.9% | Better |

### Version Insights
- **v20.1.x releases** show consistently poor ratings (~2.0) with 65% 1-star reviews
- **v20.2.0.6076** (latest) shows slight improvement but still 60% 1-star
- No significant quality improvement across recent releases
- **PM Action:** Investigate regression issues introduced in v20.1.x

## Top 10 Customer Issues

| Rank | Issue | Mentions | % of Reviews | Negative % | Severity |
|------|-------|----------|--------------|------------|----------|
| 1 | Print Quality & Functionality | 930 | 48.7% | 37.7% | High |
| 2 | Mobile App Experience | 919 | 48.1% | 40.0% | Critical |
| 3 | Feature Requests | 419 | 21.9% | 37.2% | Medium |
| 4 | Connectivity & Setup | 373 | 19.5% | 42.6% | Critical |
| 5 | Value & Pricing | 345 | 18.1% | 42.6% | High |
| 6 | App Reliability & Stability | 341 | 17.8% | 70.1% | Critical |
| 7 | Updates & Compatibility | 287 | 15.0% | 41.5% | High |
| 8 | Scanning Features | 216 | 11.3% | 28.2% | Medium |
| 9 | Customer Support | 173 | 9.1% | 39.9% | Medium |
| 10 | Account & Cloud Services | - | - | - | Low |

---

## Critical Pain Points

### 1. App Reliability & Stability (70% Negative)
- **Issue:** App crashes, freezes, and becomes unresponsive
- **Impact:** Users unable to complete basic printing tasks
- **Root Cause:** Technical debt, memory leaks, poor error handling
- **PM Action:** Immediate stability sprint required

### 2. Connectivity & Setup (43% Negative)
- **Issue:** WiFi connection failures, printer discovery issues
- **Impact:** First-time user experience severely impacted
- **Root Cause:** Network protocol handling, timeout issues
- **PM Action:** Improve onboarding flow and connection diagnostics

### 3. Value & Pricing (43% Negative)
- **Issue:** HP+ subscription model, Instant Ink frustrations
- **Impact:** Users feel locked into ecosystem
- **Root Cause:** Aggressive monetization perceived as anti-consumer
- **PM Action:** Review subscription messaging and value proposition

### 4. Mobile App Experience (40% Negative)
- **Issue:** Confusing navigation, difficult workflows
- **Impact:** Users struggle to complete simple tasks
- **Root Cause:** Feature bloat, poor information architecture
- **PM Action:** UX audit and simplification initiative

---

## PM Recommendations

### Phase 1: Stabilization (0-30 days)
1. **Stability Sprint** - Address top crash/freeze issues
2. **Connection Reliability** - Fix WiFi reconnection flow
3. **Error Messaging** - Improve error messages with actionable guidance

### Phase 2: Core Experience (30-90 days)
1. **UX Simplification** - Streamline print workflow to 2 taps
2. **Onboarding Redesign** - Guided setup with better diagnostics
3. **Release QA Enhancement** - More thorough testing before updates

### Phase 3: Value Perception (90-180 days)
1. **Subscription Clarity** - Transparent HP+/Instant Ink benefits
2. **Feature Prioritization** - Address top feature requests
3. **Support Integration** - In-app troubleshooting tools

## Voice of Customer - Sample Reviews

### Negative Feedback
- *"Just got this printer and the app is simply horrible. Returning the printer..."*
- *"App takes long time to work and connect with my printer!!! 3 hours to get it connected"*
- *"Awful NOT USER FRIENDLY. Why is it so difficult to change the wifi on your printer"*

### Positive Feedback
